verses.John 3:16: For God so loved the world, that he gave his only Son, that whoever believes in him should not perish but have eternal life.
verses.John 3:17: For God did not send his Son into the world to condemn the world, but in order that the world might be saved through him.
verses.John 3:18: Whoever believes in him is not condemned, but whoever does not believe is condemned already because he has not believed in the name of the only Son of God.
